content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Extraction and Storage Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) containing coal
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -78.5) for transferring coal
- Additional Iron Chest at position (42.5, -80.5) for coal overflow

### Iron Ore Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) containing iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) with iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) with iron plates
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) with iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -49.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-9.5, -49.5) containing iron ore
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Supplying Iron Ore to Furnaces
- Ensure that there is sufficient iron ore in your inventory before attempting to supply it to furnaces.

### Errors when Extracting from Chests
- Make sure the chest is not full and has space to extract items. If the chest is full, clear it before attempting to extract.

### Errors when Harvesting Iron Ore
- Ensure your inventory has enough space before harvesting resources to avoid the "Inventory is full" error.

### Errors when Managing Furnaces
- Check that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. If not, supply the required resources before attempting to manage them.

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place entities.
- Verify that the target tile is unoccupied before placing an entity to avoid placement failures.
